CONFIG.ua: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/130.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/130.0.0.0

values: 埋葬；掩埋；安葬；淹没；覆盖；遮盖；深藏；掩藏；遗忘；使消失；封存；使陷入；把…插入；抑制（情感或想法）；抛开；结束（愤怒或烦恼）；专心于；沉浸于；埋头于；<非正式>投；击（球）

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 埋葬（bury的过去式和过去分词）

word_group.brief_definition: 不正视现实；逃避现实；不愿正视困难；采取鸵鸟政策
word_group.phrase: bury one's head in the sand

bilingual.source: He tried to bury his feelings of guilt.
bilingual.target: 他试图埋葬他的内疚感。

bilingual.source: We bury the little cat in the backyard.
bilingual.target: 我们在后院埋葬了那只小猫。

bilingual.source: She bury her feet in the sand on the beach.
bilingual.target: 她在沙滩上埋葬了她的脚。

bilingual.source: They will bury the time capsule in the backyard.
bilingual.target: 他们将在后院埋葬时间胶囊。

bilingual.source: He tried to bury the painful memories of the past.
bilingual.target: 他试图埋葬过去的痛苦记忆。

bilingual.source: The dog likes to bury its bones in the garden.
bilingual.target: 那只狗喜欢在花园里埋葬它的骨头。

bilingual.source: They decided to bury their grandfather in their hometown.
bilingual.target: 他们决定在家乡埋葬祖父。

bilingual.source: She decided to bury her old memories and move on.
bilingual.target: 她决定埋葬她的旧记忆，继续前行。

bilingual.source: They had to bury the treasure quickly before anyone saw them.
bilingual.target: 他们必须在没人看到之前迅速埋葬宝藏。

bilingual.source: We need to find a suitable place to bury this dead tree.
bilingual.target: 我们需要找到一个合适的地方来埋葬这棵枯树。

yingyinNormal.en: You've served my family well. We shall build a great tomb and bury you with many riches.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你为我们家尽心尽力，我们会建一座巨大的坟墓，将众多财宝与你一起埋葬。
yingyinNormal.videoNameEn: 《Night at the Museum: Secret of the Tomb》

yingyinNormal.en: And then you and I together, we bury her. You drop out next week, endorse me and the race is over.
yingyinNormal.zh: 然后你与我携手，我们一起埋葬她。再下个星期你退选，转而支持我，竞选就此结束。

yingyinNormal.en: I should hide behind my wall? Take pleasure in the present state? While away my days and bury myself here when they're done?
yingyinNormal.zh: 难道我要躲藏在我的汗国内，坐享现在拥有的一切，消磨度日待到死后埋葬于此吗？

yingyinNormal.en: When we bury the body, we bury the secret forever.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们埋掉尸体，埋掉整个秘密。
就该掐死在萌芽期，对吧？

yingyinNormal.en: He means to bury us. Like the pharaohs of old.
yingyinNormal.zh: 几百米的石堆。就像埃及金字塔一样。

yingyinNormal.en: The pirates start off to bury the treasure chest, over the hill, round the little bush. Let's bury it here.
yingyinNormal.zh: 海盗们出发去埋宝箱。翻过山岭，绕过小树丛我们埋在这吧。

yingyinNormal.en: Then, the boys on the Hill, wanting no loose ends, tried to bury me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 然后，那些家伙们就想过河拆桥杀人灭口他们想做掉我。

yingyinNormal.en: Daddy! Daddy! Can we bury you in sand? Well. Please, Daddy! Oh, alright! Yippee!
yingyinNormal.zh: 爸爸！我们可以帮你埋在沙子里吗？这个...求你了，爸爸。噢，好吧！太棒了！

yingyinNormal.en: How? We'll put special things in this box. And then we'll bury it in the school garden.
yingyinNormal.zh: 怎么做？我们把一些特别的东西放进盒子里。然后把它们摆在学校的花园里。

yingyinNormal.en: Treasure maps are very useful, especial for finding your glasses if you accidentally bury them.
yingyinNormal.zh: 宝藏地图真的太有用了，特别是在你不小心把你的眼镜埋掉，要找眼镜的时候。

yingyinNormal.en: Why am I your enemy when you're the one prepared to bury our culture in history's potter's field?
yingyinNormal.zh: 为何对我怀有如此敌意？别忘了你才是那个要将我国文化掩埋于历史之墓的人。

yingyinNormal.en: Well then, hear this. You reel in those fucking cunts and end it, or by God, I'll bury the lot of yas.
yingyinNormal.zh: 听着，你他妈的找出肇事者，结束这一切，否则我会亲自送你们上西天。

yingyinNormal.en: Block all exits, cut off their supplies. You make it impossible for them to launch their hovercrafts. Bury them alive.
yingyinNormal.zh: 封堵所有出口，切断一切供给，使他们无法发射自己的飞行器。活埋他们。

yingyinNormal.en: Bury that pig in the sow-pen. And after that, I have one final task for you. And when that's done, go back to New York, son.
yingyinNormal.zh: 把这蠢货给埋了。然后，我还有最后一件事要你去办，办完之后，回纽约去，孩子。

yingyinNormal.en: How will we know where we've bury it? Let's make a treasure map. Over the hill, round the little this spot. X marks this spot.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们怎么知道我们埋在哪了呢？我们做一个宝藏图吧。翻过山岭，绕过小树丛，X标记出这个地点。X标记出这个地点。

yingyinNormal.en: And I really want this, so it wouldn't kill you to be more supportive. But if it did, you could bury me at the funeral home you direct.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我很想要这份工作，所以你多支持我一下是会死吗？如果死了，可以葬在你当入殓师的殡仪馆吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Guys, one slip-up on the next event, and we're goners. So for this to work, I'm gonna need you to take every instinct you have and bury it deep deep down. Done.
yingyinNormal.zh: 大伙儿，下一关再出错就拜拜了。保险起见，你们要把任何本能深藏起来。好的。

yingyinNormal.en: Let's put it in the treasure chest. Now we can bury it. Yes. And I'll stay here and guard the pirate ship. Okay, pirate Pedro, but don't fall asleep this time. I won't.
yingyinNormal.zh: 让我们把它放进宝箱里。现在我们去埋了它。好啊。我会呆在这里看守海盗船。好的，海盗佩德罗，但是不要再睡着了这次。我不会的。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: v. 埋葬；（bury的过去式和过去分词）

word_family.mean: v. 埋于地下；埋葬；隐藏；忘却；失去；使消失；藏匿；把…插入；遗忘；把（球）射入球门

sense_info_list.en: put something into a hole in the ground and cover it

examination_example.sentence: Archaeologists also may locate <highlight>buried</highlight> remains by using such technologies as ground radar, magnetic-field recording, and metal detectors.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 考古学家还可以利用地面雷达、磁场记录和金属探测器等技术来定位被埋藏的遗迹。

examination_example.sentence: Aerial surveys locate general areas of interest or larger <highlight>buried</highlight> features, such as ancient buildings or fields.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 空中勘测可以定位大致的目标区域或较大面积掩埋遗址的地表特征，如古建筑或战场。

examination_example.sentence: They often include a certain amount of digging to test for <highlight>buried</highlight> materials at selected points across a landscape.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它们通常包括一定量的挖掘，以测试景观中选定点的掩埋材料。

sense_info_list.en: place in a grave or tomb

word_usage.usage:
bury oneself in sth.可以表示“ 专心致志于……”，如：
Since she left, he's buried himself in his work.
自从她走后，他全心扑在工作上。
还可以表示“ 隐居于……”，如：
She buried herself in the country to write a book.
她隐居乡间写书。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 埋葬；掩埋；葬礼；坟墓；遗骸；出殡；遗骨；葬地

word_family.mean: v. 埋于地下；埋葬；隐藏；忘却；失去；使消失；藏匿；把…插入；遗忘；把（球）射入球门

sense_info_list.en: place in a grave or tomb

examination_example.sentence: So why did you put your book, The <highlight>Buried</highlight> Giant, aside for so long?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 那你为什么把你的书《被埋葬的巨人》放在一边这么久？

examination_example.sentence: I began working on my latest book, The <highlight>Buried</highlight> Giant, in 2004 but I stopped after I showed my wife a little section.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 2004年，我开始写我的新书《被掩埋的巨人》，但在我给妻子看了一小段之后，我就停止了创作。

examination_example.sentence: You have the United States government's mighty legal fighting for data of the most sympathetic sort: the secrets <highlight>buried</highlight> in a dead mass murderer's phone.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你可以看到美国政府为最值得同情的数据进行的强大的法律斗争：一个隐藏在一个大屠杀凶手手机里的秘密。

sense_info_list.en: put something into a hole in the ground and cover it

direction_info.description:

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 埋葬；掩埋；葬礼；坟墓；遗骸；出殡；遗骨；葬地

word_family.mean: v. 埋于地下；埋葬；隐藏；忘却；失去；使消失；藏匿；把…插入；遗忘；把（球）射入球门

sense_info_list.en: place in a grave or tomb

examination_example.sentence: Let's <highlight>bury</highlight> "work-life balance" and think bigger and better about work-life fulfillment to do a little less balancing and a lot more living.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 让我们埋葬“工作与生活的平衡”，生活与工作远不止于此，我们要少顾虑平衡，多考虑生活。

examination_example.sentence: A man described as a "non-worker civilian" was <highlight>buried</highlight> up to his waist in the basement.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 据悉，一名“非工人”男子在地下室被废墟埋至腰部。

sense_info_list.en: put something into a hole in the ground and cover it

examination_example.sentence: Buffington says he found a soda bottle half <highlight>buried</highlight> in the sand that "looked like it had been there since the beginning of time."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 巴芬顿说，他发现了一个半埋在沙子里的汽水瓶，“看起来就像它在那儿待了几个世纪。”

exam_freq_info.chinese: 埋葬; 蒙住; 盖住

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.zh: 埋葬; 蒙住; 盖住

examination_example.sentence: How many bad results will there be if all the rubbish is <highlight>buried</highlight> together?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果所有的垃圾都埋在一起，会有多少不好的结果?

examination_example.sentence: If you don't sort your rubbish, all of it will go to a special place where it is <highlight>buried</highlight> (埋藏) together.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你不把垃圾分类，所有的垃圾都会被送到一个特别的地方，一起埋起来。
